sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Card, Button, Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import moment from 'moment' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { MdModeEdit,MdDelete } from 'react-icons/md' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { deleteMemory } from '../actions/memoryActions' const Memory = ({ memory }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( <> {memory.title} {memory.content} Creator : {memory.creator} {moment(moment.createdAt).fromNow()} { dispatch(deleteMemory(memory._id)) } } /> ) } export default Memory
